name: can-usb-proxy
description: Remote diagnostic proxying via two-way OBD-II -> CAN -> USB -> UDP

scripts.server: cross-env DEVICE_TYPE='gs_usb' REQUEST_ARBITRATION_ID='0x64D' REPLY_ARBITRATION_ID='0x5CD' MODE='server' SERVER_PORT='40000' SERVER_ADDR='192.168.0.52' CLIENT_PORT='40001' CLIENT_ADDR='192.168.0.42' node index.js
scripts.client: cross-env DEVICE_TYPE='gs_usb' REQUEST_ARBITRATION_ID='0x64D' REPLY_ARBITRATION_ID='0x5CD' MODE='client' SERVER_PORT='40000' SERVER_ADDR='192.168.0.52' CLIENT_PORT='40001' CLIENT_ADDR='192.168.0.42' node index.js
